ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, 2 large green apples - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks, 2 tablespoons brown sugar,   +   1/4 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, or to taste, 1 teaspoon water, or more if needed (Optional), 1 pound prepared pie dough, cut into 4 pieces, 1  egg, 2 teaspoons milk, 1 teaspoon white sugar, or as needed
nutrition: Total Fat 42g 54%, Saturated Fat 13g 64%, Cholesterol 62mg 21%, Sodium 754mg 33%, Total Carbohydrate 82g 30%, Dietary Fiber 6g 23%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 5mg 27%, Calcium 38mg 3%, Iron 4mg 19%, Potassium 215mg 5%
